context_editing.description: Context editing and pruning of old content

note: v4.7.0-alpha COMPLETE: Research (3 web searches), gap analysis (762 lines), v4.7.0 proposal (850 lines), RULE 22 added (484 lines), RULE 10 enhanced, context compression guide (850 lines), comprehensive enhancement audit report (1100+ lines), README.md updated (RULE 19 fix). Two commits: 74e8217 (v4.7.0-alpha), 9854ba5 (README fix). Based on Anthropic 2025 research showing 50-80% token reduction achievable. All work committed and pushed. Phase 2 (state tracking enhancement) in progress. Previous releases: v4.5.2, v4.6.0, v4.6.1.
